comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Remember that the 5L is more like the LaserJet 4 family than the LaserJet 5 family (as with most "L" printers from HP). For example it does not work with the "lj5gray"/"lj5mono" drivers but only with the "ljet4" or "lj4dith" drivers (and Gimp-Print or HPIJS).

Getting more RAM is highly recommended; with only the standard 1Meg you may be unable to print some jobs. It is recommended to stay at 300 dpi without extra memory, and on that resolution "ljet4" is the better driver than HPIJS.
